basic_information.scholarship_name: William G. Walker Endowed Scholarship for Industrial Safety
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - William G. Walker Endowed Scholarship for I
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education and Professional Studies majoring in Occupational Safety Program at UCO. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student pursuing a degree in Occupational Safety Minimum 3.0 GPA Full-time student Demonstrate financial need Must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Occupational Safety
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Occupational Safety
